description:
This coverage shows the human population and distribution model at three distinct levels in the Northern Mozambique Channel region. This coverage was derived through spatial processing of gridded human population data sourced from the Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center archive.
Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University. 2016. Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4): Population Count. Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4X63JVC. Accessed 12 Jan 2017.
name: NMC  human population count
